cn.description:
这是一部带着奇幻色彩的异域传说。统治大漠的“旧王朝”已经崩溃，各个部落之间开始了无止境的相互攻伐，在这乱世背后，还潜藏着一个更大、更为黑暗的深渊……



在这片幻想的沙漠中，玩家将有机会扮演各种角色，在开放世界中探索。



【游戏特色】

- 开放世界，整个世界在规则演算下不断变化，每次游戏都会是不同的体验；
- 世界中存在许多谜题等待你去解开，多样的挑战BOSS，对应丰厚的奖励；
- 多周目，丰富的职业角色设定，大量可拓展的Build；
- 玩家可以招募士兵，培养自己的部队，在这片大陆上和敌方展开大规模攻防战；
- AI叛逃系统，经营势力与NPC之间的关系，获取部落称号！

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力
cn.releaseNotes:

1、修复了独孤剑一地下擂台事件中个别剧情被跳过的问题；
2、优化了部分事件文本。

【模组新增】
1、【内容扩展】大侠修仙传（新）——作者：小龙鱼
该版本是全新重置版本，不与老档兼容；
核心玩法：境界机制、五行灵根、小师妹彩蛋、常驻的每日拍卖会。

【模组调整&修复】
1、【体验调整】江湖逍遥：
     新增道具“邀请坠饰”、“无敌开关”。
2、【体验调整】一统江湖：
     增加开局可用特征点数；
     取消“典籍”物品的使用限制。
3、【体验调整】社会废人钟某【新】：
     变身铁面人时立绘调整为铁面大侠，装备传国玉玺可变身为皇帝大侠立绘称帝的我；

cn.description:
随时随地，行侠仗义！《大侠立志传》是半瓶神仙醋开发的开放世界武侠RPG游戏。这是一款像素版江湖生存模拟器，你将扮演一个初出茅庐的市井小人物，体验多样身份，在江湖中摸爬滚打，最终脱颖而出。

【游戏特色】
- 百余种武学功法，拳掌刀剑，枪棍音律，内外兼修，皆可自行搭配。成为十字坡剑圣，亦可精通百家所长。
- 多分支走向。游戏中没有真正意义上的主线，在充满抉择的江湖中从心选择吧。
- 丰富的NPC交互玩法，结交五都侠客（侣），游走于盘杂的人际势力，经营你的江湖关系网。
- 奇遇和危险并存的真实武林。江湖并非非黑即白，遇事不一定要用拳头解决，采取多种方式应对，并坦然接受不一样的结局。
- 充满烟火气息的像素武侠世界。游戏中有着自然流逝的时间，各色NPC都有自己独立的行为AI。

《笼中窥梦》是一款「视错觉」解谜游戏，由两人工作室Optillusion开发完成。

游戏的内容全部包含在一个神秘的立方体中，立方体的每个面都是一个独立的世界：工厂，灯塔，游乐园，教堂等等，他们之间看似毫不相关，实则交错万千，充满了意想不到的关联……

【烧脑视错觉解谜】
发挥你的脑洞与想象力，找到那些平凡场景与物体之间的联系，产生意想不到的奇妙互动，拼接，然后见证奇迹诞生。

【收集照片拼凑故事】
谜题背后，游戏还有一个等待着被玩家们发现并反转的故事。通过收集照片拼凑故事，试着解开它隐藏的真相吧。

【多重提示杜绝卡关】
游戏包含多种解谜引导机制，包括最基础的「视觉引导」，帮助你快速定位关键物品；而「文字提示」则可以帮你整理解谜思路；最后还有「视频提示」，用终极手段保证你绝不会卡关。

【拿下奖章证明实力】
游戏拥有 15 个成就，每个成就都对应着一个根据剧情设计的独特奖章。如果你是解谜游戏达人，那就用这些奖章来证明自己吧~

【联系我们】
玩家1群：626570283（已满）
玩家2群：912766585
官方微博：@心动网络 、@笼中窥梦-Moncage
官方邮箱：moncagethegame@gmail.com

hk.description:
Speech to text : Voice to text  is the powerful, real-time dictation solution. Based on the latest artificial intelligence and using a powerful speech recognition engine, This Dictation app accurately transcribes your speech to text in real time. 

The clean elegant design, along with the non-stop voice recognition and other features means you can relax and focus on your thoughts and content.

Using our app , your words will be magically transcribed into text without your ever needing to touch a keyboard. Now you can use the power of your voice to create your words!

Easily share your text and files later! (Works with Evernote, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, WhatsApp and other iOS supported sharing apps.)


Whether you’re a professional writer, doctor, lawyer, disabled or somehow prevented from traditional typing, Speech to text : Voice to text app will swiftly solve your transcription problems and help you achieve your writing goals today!



This fantastic speech-to-text app will allow you to do more with your iPhone/ iPad :

・Longer Record time:
 -DICTATE CONTINUOUSLY up-to 1 HOUR.

・Unlimited save & edits

・Transcribed text can be edited directly.
・Ideal for both individual and group transcription
・Background support for voice recognition.
・On-device Speech Recognition.

• Voice recognition support for 59 languages and accents.
• Share your text on social networks.
• Copy your text to other apps.
• Send your text as an email or text message.

• Create PDF instantly with single click.
• Convert text your notes, reports, letters into PDF instantly
• Text Analysis using AI.

►  Currently Supported Speech Recognition Languages: Arabic, Cantonese, Catalan, Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malay, Norwegian, Bokmål, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Shanghainese, Slovak, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese.

Technology:
New iOS 14 Speech framework having state of the art accuracy,
Faster ,Automatically adapts to the user

Super easy: Simply click the microphone and start dictating. No need to login or register

You can add new paragraphs, punctuation marks, smileys and other special characters using simple voice commands.

Who Should Use Speech to Text : Voice to Text ?

1. Reporters: Interviews, conversations and more are easily recorded and transcribed, preserving the original audio.

2. Writers: Novelists, Authors, can all write in their true voice, capturing their moments of inspiration anytime, anywhere.

3. Professionals: Doctors, lawyers, managers, etc. Easily transcribe your daily tasks, notes, conference calls, letters and more! Your voice makes it happen!

4. Elderly or Disabled: Eliminates slow typing, commonly misspelled words or embarrassing composition mistakes. This app makes it convenient and easy to send and share your words with those you love.

5. Language Students: Text analysis using AI , Easily learn and master new words and languages by practicing dictation with speech to text app !

hk.description:
Atomic Space Age was a blast! Until it became the Post-Apocalyptic Space Age.

Your space station is about to explode and you only have 60 seconds before things get messy. What (or who) will you grab before you make a mad dash for the emergency shuttle and begin your journey into THE GREAT UNKNOWN?

This is 60 Parsecs!, a dark comedy sci-fi adventure set in the Atomic Space Age - complete with all the Cold War paranoia, chrome-plated wall accents and cockroaches with space helmets.

Lead a crew of woefully unprepared astronauts, equipped with whatever junk - sorry - "supplies" you can grab before blasting off, on a journey across the cosmos that's best described as misguided. Make the best of it, while dealing with soup shortages and other horrors of outer space. Will you have what it takes to find a new home and survive?

Bon voyage!


SCAVENGE & EVACUATE
With only 60 seconds before nukes reduce the space station to floating particles in the vacuum of space, frantically grab whatever supplies and crew you can before getting out of there. You never know when that sock puppet will come in handy.

SURVIVE & DECIDE
Space funerals are inconvenient, so try to avoid dying where possible. Use your limited supplies and (hopefully not limited) wits to make difficult choices and ensure your survival, even though the odds are definitely stacked against you.

EXPLORE & CRAFT
Duct tape fixes all problems, but how do you fix (or at least craft) duct tape? Chart expeditions to find resources, craft survival essentials and explore strange new worlds in a procedural, very-much-permadeath adventure.

LEAD & PROTECT
As captain, it's your duty to keep the crew happy - they're less likely to kill you that way. Manage relationships as you watch them grow closer and hopefully not throw each other out the airlock.

NEW OPPORTUNITIES
to escape the wasteland in form of a storyline spanning across multiple playthroughs! Can you escape the wasteland in style?

more stories and crazy interactions between the McDoodle family members!

NEW SOUNDS, ART AND UNLOCKABLE VISUAL CONTENT
allowing you to add a little color to your fallout shelter!

NEW ACHIEVEMENTS!

With only 60 seconds left to impact, go on a mad dash through the house in search of family members and useful supplies. Everything will be against you: time, your very own furniture, a house that's different every time you play, and the fundamental question... what to take with you and who to leave behind?

Reaching the fallout shelter in time, alive, is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland.

Good luck.

《籠中窺夢》是一款「視錯覺」解謎遊戲，由兩人工作室Optillusion開發完成。

遊戲的內容全部包含在一個神秘的立方體中，立方體的每個面都是一個獨立的世界：工廠，燈塔，遊樂園，教堂等等，他們之間看似毫不相關，實則交錯萬千，充滿了意想不到的關聯……

【燒腦視錯覺解謎】
發揮你的腦洞與想象力，找到那些平凡場景與物體之間的聯系，產生意想不到的奇妙互動，拼接，然後見證奇跡誕生。

【收集照片拼湊故事】
謎題背後，遊戲還有一個等待著被玩家們發現並反轉的故事。通過收集照片拼湊故事，試著解開它隱藏的真相吧。

【多重提示杜絕卡關】
遊戲包含多種解謎引導機製，包括最基礎的「視覺引導」，幫助你快速定位關鍵物品；而「文字提示」則可以幫你整理解謎思路；最後還有「視頻提示」，用終極手段保證你絕不會卡關。

【拿下獎章證明實力】
遊戲擁有 15 個成就，每個成就都對應著一個根據劇情設計的獨特獎章。如果你是解謎遊戲達人，那就用這些獎章來證明自己吧~

【聯系我們】
官方QQ討論群：626570283
官方微博：@心動網絡 、@籠中窺夢-Moncage
官方郵箱：moncagethegame@gmail.com

Keep the words, pictures, videos, voice and positions you want to record at any time and anywhere.
And there are reminders that you can never forget.

hk.description:
Thumper是一款節奏暴力遊戲：經典動作、猛烈的速度和野蠻的肉體衝撞。你是一隻太空甲蟲，勇敢闖入虛無空間，對抗巨大的首腦。

藉由特別的便攜版，讓你一手掌握九個史詩級別。

向前邁進，掌握新動作，並在可怕的魔王戰中倖存下來。被衝擊原聲推動，你會感受到每一個破碎的影響。要達到共鳴，你必須征服節奏地獄。

■特點■
·氣密一觸式控制
·肖像和風景皆為流暢的60 FPS
·九個史詩級別
·刺激的魔王戰
·迷幻視覺效果和原創配樂
·PLAY+模式（增加挑戰難度和速度）
·在iPhone X上以全螢幕顯示
·iCloud 同步

■請注意■
無線耳機會造成顯著的音頻延遲。為了獲得最佳體驗，強烈建議使用有線耳機或音響。

hk.description:
你獨自一人在一座陌生的島嶼醒來，島上充滿各種令人意想不到的謎題，等你來挑戰。

你不記得自己是誰，也不記得是如何來到這裡，你唯一能做的就是探索這座島嶼，希望挖掘線索找回自己的記憶，想辦法找到回家的路。

The Witness 是一個單人遊戲，玩家在一個含有數十個地點的開放世界裡探索並克服 500 道以上的謎題。這個遊戲相當敬重玩家的聰明才智，並珍惜他們寶貴的時間。這裡沒有濫竽充數的謎題，每道謎題都結合新的概念在裡面。所以，這是一個充滿創意的遊戲。

Incredibox 能讓你在一群快樂的節奏口技達人幫助下創作自己的音樂。選擇你的音樂風格，開始錄製、錄音並分享你的混音曲。透過嘻哈節拍、電子波、流行人聲、爵士搖擺、巴西節奏等等聲音，讓你沉醉在音樂的律動之中。此外，還可以探索社群創建的各種模組，其內容素材豐富，能讓你混音上數小時，而且無廣告或應用程式內購。

Incredibox 是遊戲，也是工具，更重要的是一種視聽體驗，所帶來的樂趣很快就成為各年齡層的熱門選擇。音樂、圖形、動畫與互動性的完美結合，讓 Incredibox 適合每個人。由於 Incredibox 讓學習變得有趣且具娛樂性，現在廣為全球各地學校使用。

怎麼玩？很簡單！將圖示拖放到虛擬人物上讓他們唱歌，然後開始創作你的音樂。找對的聲音組合，解鎖動畫合唱，增強你的旋律。

只要你的作品聽起來很棒，就儲存並分享，以盡可能獲得投票。假如你獲得足夠的票數，就能進入 Incredibox 歷史，加入 50 強排行榜！準備好展示你的作品了嗎？

你還可以從應用程式中將你的混音曲下載成 MP3 反覆聆聽！

懶得創作自己的混音曲？沒問題，讓自動模式為你播放吧！

調高音量，輕鬆一下 ;)

****************
Incredibox，來自法國里昂，於 2009 年創立的 So Far So Good 工作室的心血結晶。最初以網頁形式出現，隨後推出了移動及平板應用程式，迅速成為熱門產品。它贏得了多項獎項，並出現在各大國際媒體上，包括：BBC、Adobe、FWA、Gizmodo、Slate、Konbini、Softonic、Kotaku、Cosmopolitan、PocketGamer、AppAdvice、AppSpy、Vice、Ultralinx 等等。線上演示影片自創建以來已吸引超過 1 億訪問者。

MiniGames 是一個包含新、復古和現代遊戲的合集。您可以在您的 Apple Watch、iPhone 或 iPad 上無廣告遊玩！
這就像是您隨身攜帶的個人遊戲機台。

這個合集包含 24 款遊戲：

■ PONG
遊玩其中一個最早創建的電子遊戲。這個簡單的網球類遊戲是一個絕對的經典。

■ BRICK BREAK
一個有趣的復古落磚遊戲。使用數位旋鈕或您的手指來移動磚塊。點擊以旋轉，向下滑動以放置磚塊。將磚塊堆疊在一起以清除一行並獲取一些分數。

■ INVADERS
經典街機動作。射擊所有太空入侵者，在他們抓到你之前。擊中母艦以獲取獎勵分數。

■ 2048
在您的手錶或手機上享受令人上癮的 2048 遊戲。滑動數字瓷磚來合併它們。將瓷磚合併以達到 2048。

■ TUBE TWIST
引導您的跑者穿過無盡的管道。扭轉管道以避開洞穴和尖刺。收集黃色能量球，收集的越多，速度提升的時間越長。點擊您的玩家來啟動加速。加速時撞擊紅色跳躍點可獲取額外分數。

■ BUBBLE
經典的三消益智遊戲。按顏色連接泡泡以清除它們。

■ MISSILE
您能在致命的追蹤導彈攻擊下生存多久？操縱您的戰鬥機以避開導彈並讓它們互相碰撞。

■ HOP
從平台跳到平台以獲得更多的高度和分數。在途中射擊帶翅膀的壞蛋。

■ DRIFT
享受在險惡道路上的高辛烷值漂移。一個錯誤的動作就會墜落。儘可能長時間生存以獲得最高分數。收集星星以獲取額外分數。

■ CONG
這像 Pong，但在一個圓圈裡。使用數位旋鈕來移動圓圈內的拍子，保持球在遊戲中。

■ TOWER
通過堆疊彩色方塊來建造您的塔。完美放置它們以獲取額外分數。

■ FLAP
引導鳥兒穿越無盡的森林，不斷拍動翅膀。

■ FROG ROAD
幫助可愛的青蛙避開汽車並穿過馬路。這是經典 Frogger 遊戲的 3D 升級版。

■ BLOCK RUN
想跑步嗎？幫助體素小人避開五彩繽紛的障礙物，通過跳躍、滾動和轉彎來完成挑戰。

■ MATCHTRIS
Tetris 和 Dr. Mario 的混搭遊戲。移動下落的方塊來連接 4 個或更多相同顏色的方塊以清除它們。設置方塊以實現連鎖反應並獲取額外分數。

■ DRONE
駕駛您的無人機穿過外星飛船的無盡走廊。

■ THRUST
穿上火箭靴並飛越黑暗的洞穴。Thrust 結合了經典洞穴飛行遊戲和 Flappy Bird 的元素。

■ SUPER JUMP
我們將平台遊戲的樂趣與無盡奔跑者遊戲相結合。通過跳過洞穴、壕溝和敵人來保持您的玩家奔跑。收集水果以獲取分數，您得分越多，跑得越快。

■ RETRO RACER
受 Outrun 和 Pole Position 等偽 3D 賽車遊戲啟發，但具有現代圖形。享受超現實、令人興奮的速度感，並競速以擊敗時鐘。

請注意，此遊戲需要第 4 代或更新版本的 Apple Watch。

■ CONTRA PANG
將 Contra 的射擊動作與 Pang 的泡泡消除樂趣相結合的遊戲。

■ CIRCLE INVADERS
經典 Space Invaders 的新變種。具有獨特的圓形設計和大量的能量提升。

■ MOON SNAKE
我們將經典的吃水果蛇遊戲帶到了月球。避開炸彈和自己的尾巴以生存。

■ DUAL BREAK
還有什麼比經典的 Breakout 拍子遊戲更好？怎麼樣再加上能量提升和額外的拍子來控制。

■ CIRCLE BREAK
這就像圓形 Pong 遇上 Breakout。保持球不離開圓圈並打破所有障礙以完成關卡。

功能：
• 無廣告！
• 支援 Apple Watch
• 屏幕震動
• 震動效果
• 音效
• 音樂
• 排行榜

Speech to text : Voice to text  is the powerful, real-time dictation solution. Based on the latest artificial intelligence and using a powerful speech recognition engine, This Dictation app accurately transcribes your speech to text in real time. 

The clean elegant design, along with the non-stop voice recognition and other features means you can relax and focus on your thoughts and content.

Using our app , your words will be magically transcribed into text without your ever needing to touch a keyboard. Now you can use the power of your voice to create your words!

Easily share your text and files later! (Works with Evernote, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, WhatsApp and other iOS supported sharing apps.)


Whether you’re a professional writer, doctor, lawyer, disabled or somehow prevented from traditional typing, Speech to text : Voice to text app will swiftly solve your transcription problems and help you achieve your writing goals today!



This fantastic speech-to-text app will allow you to do more with your iPhone/ iPad :

・Longer Record time:
 -DICTATE CONTINUOUSLY up-to 1 HOUR.

・Unlimited save & edits

・Transcribed text can be edited directly.
・Ideal for both individual and group transcription
・Background support for voice recognition.
・On-device Speech Recognition.

• Voice recognition support for 59 languages and accents.
• Share your text on social networks.
• Copy your text to other apps.
• Send your text as an email or text message.

• Create PDF instantly with single click.
• Convert text your notes, reports, letters into PDF instantly
• Text Analysis using AI.

►  Currently Supported Speech Recognition Languages: Arabic, Cantonese, Catalan, Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malay, Norwegian, Bokmål, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Shanghainese, Slovak, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese.

Technology:
New iOS 14 Speech framework having state of the art accuracy,
Faster ,Automatically adapts to the user

Super easy: Simply click the microphone and start dictating. No need to login or register

You can add new paragraphs, punctuation marks, smileys and other special characters using simple voice commands.

Who Should Use Speech to Text : Voice to Text ?

1. Reporters: Interviews, conversations and more are easily recorded and transcribed, preserving the original audio.

2. Writers: Novelists, Authors, can all write in their true voice, capturing their moments of inspiration anytime, anywhere.

3. Professionals: Doctors, lawyers, managers, etc. Easily transcribe your daily tasks, notes, conference calls, letters and more! Your voice makes it happen!

4. Elderly or Disabled: Eliminates slow typing, commonly misspelled words or embarrassing composition mistakes. This app makes it convenient and easy to send and share your words with those you love.

5. Language Students: Text analysis using AI , Easily learn and master new words and languages by practicing dictation with speech to text app !

mo.description:
Atomic Space Age was a blast! Until it became the Post-Apocalyptic Space Age.

Your space station is about to explode and you only have 60 seconds before things get messy. What (or who) will you grab before you make a mad dash for the emergency shuttle and begin your journey into THE GREAT UNKNOWN?

This is 60 Parsecs!, a dark comedy sci-fi adventure set in the Atomic Space Age - complete with all the Cold War paranoia, chrome-plated wall accents and cockroaches with space helmets.

Lead a crew of woefully unprepared astronauts, equipped with whatever junk - sorry - "supplies" you can grab before blasting off, on a journey across the cosmos that's best described as misguided. Make the best of it, while dealing with soup shortages and other horrors of outer space. Will you have what it takes to find a new home and survive?

Bon voyage!


SCAVENGE & EVACUATE
With only 60 seconds before nukes reduce the space station to floating particles in the vacuum of space, frantically grab whatever supplies and crew you can before getting out of there. You never know when that sock puppet will come in handy.

SURVIVE & DECIDE
Space funerals are inconvenient, so try to avoid dying where possible. Use your limited supplies and (hopefully not limited) wits to make difficult choices and ensure your survival, even though the odds are definitely stacked against you.

EXPLORE & CRAFT
Duct tape fixes all problems, but how do you fix (or at least craft) duct tape? Chart expeditions to find resources, craft survival essentials and explore strange new worlds in a procedural, very-much-permadeath adventure.

LEAD & PROTECT
As captain, it's your duty to keep the crew happy - they're less likely to kill you that way. Manage relationships as you watch them grow closer and hopefully not throw each other out the airlock.

mo.description:
Dolores, Ted, Mary Jane and Timmy return to face the nuclear apocalypse in this new, remastered edition of the classic atomic adventure - 60 Seconds! Reatomized, featuring high resolution art support, refreshed 2D graphics and hand-drawn 3D textures, new interactive menu, improved UI system, a technical refresh, and of course... new content!

NEW GAMEPLAY MODE
Survival Challenges - unique, short storylines which will put your survival skills to the test!

NEW OPPORTUNITIES
to escape the wasteland in form of a storyline spanning across multiple playthroughs! Can you escape the wasteland in style?

NEW RELATIONSHIP SYSTEM
more stories and crazy interactions between the McDoodle family members!

NEW SOUNDS, ART AND UNLOCKABLE VISUAL CONTENT
allowing you to add a little color to your fallout shelter!

NEW ACHIEVEMENTS!

With only 60 seconds left to impact, go on a mad dash through the house in search of family members and useful supplies. Everything will be against you: time, your very own furniture, a house that's different every time you play, and the fundamental question... what to take with you and who to leave behind?

Reaching the fallout shelter in time, alive, is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland.

Good luck.

《籠中窺夢》是一款「視錯覺」解謎遊戲，由兩人工作室Optillusion開發完成。

遊戲的內容全部包含在一個神秘的立方體中，立方體的每個面都是一個獨立的世界：工廠，燈塔，遊樂園，教堂等等，他們之間看似毫不相關，實則交錯萬千，充滿了意想不到的關聯……

【燒腦視錯覺解謎】
發揮你的腦洞與想象力，找到那些平凡場景與物體之間的聯系，產生意想不到的奇妙互動，拼接，然後見證奇跡誕生。

【收集照片拼湊故事】
謎題背後，遊戲還有一個等待著被玩家們發現並反轉的故事。通過收集照片拼湊故事，試著解開它隱藏的真相吧。

【多重提示杜絕卡關】
遊戲包含多種解謎引導機製，包括最基礎的「視覺引導」，幫助你快速定位關鍵物品；而「文字提示」則可以幫你整理解謎思路；最後還有「視頻提示」，用終極手段保證你絕不會卡關。

【拿下獎章證明實力】
遊戲擁有 15 個成就，每個成就都對應著一個根據劇情設計的獨特獎章。如果你是解謎遊戲達人，那就用這些獎章來證明自己吧~

【聯系我們】
官方QQ討論群：626570283
官方微博：@心動網絡 、@籠中窺夢-Moncage
官方郵箱：moncagethegame@gmail.com

Keep the words, pictures, videos, voice and positions you want to record at any time and anywhere.
And there are reminders that you can never forget.

mo.description:
Thumper是一款節奏暴力遊戲：經典動作、猛烈的速度和野蠻的肉體衝撞。你是一隻太空甲蟲，勇敢闖入虛無空間，對抗巨大的首腦。

藉由特別的便攜版，讓你一手掌握九個史詩級別。

向前邁進，掌握新動作，並在可怕的魔王戰中倖存下來。被衝擊原聲推動，你會感受到每一個破碎的影響。要達到共鳴，你必須征服節奏地獄。

■特點■
·氣密一觸式控制
·肖像和風景皆為流暢的60 FPS
·九個史詩級別
·刺激的魔王戰
·迷幻視覺效果和原創配樂
·PLAY+模式（增加挑戰難度和速度）
·在iPhone X上以全螢幕顯示
·iCloud 同步

■請注意■
無線耳機會造成顯著的音頻延遲。為了獲得最佳體驗，強烈建議使用有線耳機或音響。

mo.description:
你獨自一人在一座陌生的島嶼醒來，島上充滿各種令人意想不到的謎題，等你來挑戰。

你不記得自己是誰，也不記得是如何來到這裡，你唯一能做的就是探索這座島嶼，希望挖掘線索找回自己的記憶，想辦法找到回家的路。

The Witness 是一個單人遊戲，玩家在一個含有數十個地點的開放世界裡探索並克服 500 道以上的謎題。這個遊戲相當敬重玩家的聰明才智，並珍惜他們寶貴的時間。這裡沒有濫竽充數的謎題，每道謎題都結合新的概念在裡面。所以，這是一個充滿創意的遊戲。

Incredibox 能讓你在一群快樂的節奏口技達人幫助下創作自己的音樂。選擇你的音樂風格，開始錄製、錄音並分享你的混音曲。透過嘻哈節拍、電子波、流行人聲、爵士搖擺、巴西節奏等等聲音，讓你沉醉在音樂的律動之中。此外，還可以探索社群創建的各種模組，其內容素材豐富，能讓你混音上數小時，而且無廣告或應用程式內購。

Incredibox 是遊戲，也是工具，更重要的是一種視聽體驗，所帶來的樂趣很快就成為各年齡層的熱門選擇。音樂、圖形、動畫與互動性的完美結合，讓 Incredibox 適合每個人。由於 Incredibox 讓學習變得有趣且具娛樂性，現在廣為全球各地學校使用。

怎麼玩？很簡單！將圖示拖放到虛擬人物上讓他們唱歌，然後開始創作你的音樂。找對的聲音組合，解鎖動畫合唱，增強你的旋律。

只要你的作品聽起來很棒，就儲存並分享，以盡可能獲得投票。假如你獲得足夠的票數，就能進入 Incredibox 歷史，加入 50 強排行榜！準備好展示你的作品了嗎？

你還可以從應用程式中將你的混音曲下載成 MP3 反覆聆聽！

懶得創作自己的混音曲？沒問題，讓自動模式為你播放吧！

調高音量，輕鬆一下 ;)

****************
Incredibox，來自法國里昂，於 2009 年創立的 So Far So Good 工作室的心血結晶。最初以網頁形式出現，隨後推出了移動及平板應用程式，迅速成為熱門產品。它贏得了多項獎項，並出現在各大國際媒體上，包括：BBC、Adobe、FWA、Gizmodo、Slate、Konbini、Softonic、Kotaku、Cosmopolitan、PocketGamer、AppAdvice、AppSpy、Vice、Ultralinx 等等。線上演示影片自創建以來已吸引超過 1 億訪問者。

MiniGames 是一個包含新、復古和現代遊戲的合集。您可以在您的 Apple Watch、iPhone 或 iPad 上無廣告遊玩！
這就像是您隨身攜帶的個人遊戲機台。

這個合集包含 24 款遊戲：

■ PONG
遊玩其中一個最早創建的電子遊戲。這個簡單的網球類遊戲是一個絕對的經典。

■ BRICK BREAK
一個有趣的復古落磚遊戲。使用數位旋鈕或您的手指來移動磚塊。點擊以旋轉，向下滑動以放置磚塊。將磚塊堆疊在一起以清除一行並獲取一些分數。

■ INVADERS
經典街機動作。射擊所有太空入侵者，在他們抓到你之前。擊中母艦以獲取獎勵分數。

■ 2048
在您的手錶或手機上享受令人上癮的 2048 遊戲。滑動數字瓷磚來合併它們。將瓷磚合併以達到 2048。

■ TUBE TWIST
引導您的跑者穿過無盡的管道。扭轉管道以避開洞穴和尖刺。收集黃色能量球，收集的越多，速度提升的時間越長。點擊您的玩家來啟動加速。加速時撞擊紅色跳躍點可獲取額外分數。

■ BUBBLE
經典的三消益智遊戲。按顏色連接泡泡以清除它們。

■ MISSILE
您能在致命的追蹤導彈攻擊下生存多久？操縱您的戰鬥機以避開導彈並讓它們互相碰撞。

■ HOP
從平台跳到平台以獲得更多的高度和分數。在途中射擊帶翅膀的壞蛋。

■ DRIFT
享受在險惡道路上的高辛烷值漂移。一個錯誤的動作就會墜落。儘可能長時間生存以獲得最高分數。收集星星以獲取額外分數。

■ CONG
這像 Pong，但在一個圓圈裡。使用數位旋鈕來移動圓圈內的拍子，保持球在遊戲中。

■ TOWER
通過堆疊彩色方塊來建造您的塔。完美放置它們以獲取額外分數。

■ FLAP
引導鳥兒穿越無盡的森林，不斷拍動翅膀。

■ FROG ROAD
幫助可愛的青蛙避開汽車並穿過馬路。這是經典 Frogger 遊戲的 3D 升級版。

■ BLOCK RUN
想跑步嗎？幫助體素小人避開五彩繽紛的障礙物，通過跳躍、滾動和轉彎來完成挑戰。

■ MATCHTRIS
Tetris 和 Dr. Mario 的混搭遊戲。移動下落的方塊來連接 4 個或更多相同顏色的方塊以清除它們。設置方塊以實現連鎖反應並獲取額外分數。

■ DRONE
駕駛您的無人機穿過外星飛船的無盡走廊。

■ THRUST
穿上火箭靴並飛越黑暗的洞穴。Thrust 結合了經典洞穴飛行遊戲和 Flappy Bird 的元素。

■ SUPER JUMP
我們將平台遊戲的樂趣與無盡奔跑者遊戲相結合。通過跳過洞穴、壕溝和敵人來保持您的玩家奔跑。收集水果以獲取分數，您得分越多，跑得越快。

■ RETRO RACER
受 Outrun 和 Pole Position 等偽 3D 賽車遊戲啟發，但具有現代圖形。享受超現實、令人興奮的速度感，並競速以擊敗時鐘。

請注意，此遊戲需要第 4 代或更新版本的 Apple Watch。

■ CONTRA PANG
將 Contra 的射擊動作與 Pang 的泡泡消除樂趣相結合的遊戲。

■ CIRCLE INVADERS
經典 Space Invaders 的新變種。具有獨特的圓形設計和大量的能量提升。

■ MOON SNAKE
我們將經典的吃水果蛇遊戲帶到了月球。避開炸彈和自己的尾巴以生存。

■ DUAL BREAK
還有什麼比經典的 Breakout 拍子遊戲更好？怎麼樣再加上能量提升和額外的拍子來控制。

■ CIRCLE BREAK
這就像圓形 Pong 遇上 Breakout。保持球不離開圓圈並打破所有障礙以完成關卡。

功能：
• 無廣告！
• 支援 Apple Watch
• 屏幕震動
• 震動效果
• 音效
• 音樂
• 排行榜

The clean elegant design, along with the non-stop voice recognition and other features means you can relax and focus on your thoughts and content.

Using our app , your words will be magically transcribed into text without your ever needing to touch a keyboard. Now you can use the power of your voice to create your words!

Easily share your text and files later! (Works with Evernote, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, WhatsApp and other iOS supported sharing apps.)


Whether you’re a professional writer, doctor, lawyer, disabled or somehow prevented from traditional typing, Speech to text : Voice to text app will swiftly solve your transcription problems and help you achieve your writing goals today!



This fantastic speech-to-text app will allow you to do more with your iPhone/ iPad :

・Unlimited save & edits

・Transcribed text can be edited directly.

• Voice recognition support for 59 languages and accents.
• Share your text on social networks.
• Copy your text to other apps.
• Send your text as an email or text message.

• Create PDF instantly with single click.

Faster ,Automatically adapts to the user

Super easy: Simply click the microphone and start dictating. No need to login or register

You can add new paragraphs, punctuation marks, smileys and other special characters using simple voice commands.

Who Should Use Speech to Text : Voice to Text ?

1. Reporters: Interviews, conversations and more are easily recorded and transcribed, preserving the original audio.

2. Writers: Novelists, Authors, can all write in their true voice, capturing their moments of inspiration anytime, anywhere.

tw.description:
Atomic Space Age was a blast! Until it became the Post-Apocalyptic Space Age.

Your space station is about to explode and you only have 60 seconds before things get messy. What (or who) will you grab before you make a mad dash for the emergency shuttle and begin your journey into THE GREAT UNKNOWN?

This is 60 Parsecs!, a dark comedy sci-fi adventure set in the Atomic Space Age - complete with all the Cold War paranoia, chrome-plated wall accents and cockroaches with space helmets.

Lead a crew of woefully unprepared astronauts, equipped with whatever junk - sorry - "supplies" you can grab before blasting off, on a journey across the cosmos that's best described as misguided. Make the best of it, while dealing with soup shortages and other horrors of outer space. Will you have what it takes to find a new home and survive?

Bon voyage!


SCAVENGE & EVACUATE
With only 60 seconds before nukes reduce the space station to floating particles in the vacuum of space, frantically grab whatever supplies and crew you can before getting out of there. You never know when that sock puppet will come in handy.

SURVIVE & DECIDE
Space funerals are inconvenient, so try to avoid dying where possible. Use your limited supplies and (hopefully not limited) wits to make difficult choices and ensure your survival, even though the odds are definitely stacked against you.

EXPLORE & CRAFT
Duct tape fixes all problems, but how do you fix (or at least craft) duct tape? Chart expeditions to find resources, craft survival essentials and explore strange new worlds in a procedural, very-much-permadeath adventure.

LEAD & PROTECT
As captain, it's your duty to keep the crew happy - they're less likely to kill you that way. Manage relationships as you watch them grow closer and hopefully not throw each other out the airlock.

tw.description:
Dolores, Ted, Mary Jane and Timmy return to face the nuclear apocalypse in this new, remastered edition of the classic atomic adventure - 60 Seconds! Reatomized, featuring high resolution art support, refreshed 2D graphics and hand-drawn 3D textures, new interactive menu, improved UI system, a technical refresh, and of course... new content!

NEW GAMEPLAY MODE
Survival Challenges - unique, short storylines which will put your survival skills to the test!

NEW OPPORTUNITIES
to escape the wasteland in form of a storyline spanning across multiple playthroughs! Can you escape the wasteland in style?

NEW RELATIONSHIP SYSTEM
more stories and crazy interactions between the McDoodle family members!

NEW SOUNDS, ART AND UNLOCKABLE VISUAL CONTENT
allowing you to add a little color to your fallout shelter!

NEW ACHIEVEMENTS!

With only 60 seconds left to impact, go on a mad dash through the house in search of family members and useful supplies. Everything will be against you: time, your very own furniture, a house that's different every time you play, and the fundamental question... what to take with you and who to leave behind?

Reaching the fallout shelter in time, alive, is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland.

Good luck.

《籠中窺夢》是一款「視錯覺」解謎遊戲，由兩人工作室Optillusion開發完成。

遊戲的內容全部包含在一個神秘的立方體中，立方體的每個面都是一個獨立的世界：工廠，燈塔，遊樂園，教堂等等，他們之間看似毫不相關，實則交錯萬千，充滿了意想不到的關聯……

【燒腦視錯覺解謎】
發揮你的腦洞與想象力，找到那些平凡場景與物體之間的聯系，產生意想不到的奇妙互動，拼接，然後見證奇跡誕生。

謎題背後，遊戲還有一個等待著被玩家們發現並反轉的故事。通過收集照片拼湊故事，試著解開它隱藏的真相吧。

【多重提示杜絕卡關】
遊戲包含多種解謎引導機製，包括最基礎的「視覺引導」，幫助你快速定位關鍵物品；而「文字提示」則可以幫你整理解謎思路；最後還有「視頻提示」，用終極手段保證你絕不會卡關。

【拿下獎章證明實力】
遊戲擁有 15 個成就，每個成就都對應著一個根據劇情設計的獨特獎章。如果你是解謎遊戲達人，那就用這些獎章來證明自己吧~

tw.description:
Apple 年度最佳應用程式 Day One，全球下載次數超過 1,500 萬次，獲得 200,000 次 5 星評價，徹底改變了寫日記的方式，讓你記錄生活中的點點滴滴。  在全球最值得信賴的數位日記中安全地儲存音訊、影片、照片、筆記等其他內容。

「Day One 創造珍貴的回憶，近乎完美：完全隱密的數位空間。」 –《紐約時報》

「Day One 讓寫日記變得輕鬆愉快。」 – 《連線》

「這款優異的日記應用程式賞心悅目、簡單好用，讓競爭對手難以超越。」–《Macworld》

為什麼選擇 Day One？

Day One 是原創日記應用程式。十年來持續更新並增添功能，打造全球最隱密、最值得信賴，也最好用的日記平台。

簡單好用，讓人著迷

• 獲獎設計，美觀大方
• 無限文本條目
• 無限量照片和影片*
•強大的 RTF 文字格式與 Markdown
• 記錄生活點滴的全新方式*

私密又安全

• 自動備份，妥善保護日記條目
• 端對端加密，100% 確保日記隱密
•透過密碼或 TouchID 保障日記條目安全
•提供多種匯出選項 (pdf、純文字、JSON 等)，確保日記條目永遠歸你所有

養成並保持習慣

•可設定的提醒通知
• 每日不重覆的日記提示，消除你的撰寫障礙
•可自訂範本讓你省下時間，並讓版面看起來井井有條
• 今日檢視讓你快速查看今天去過哪些地方、做了哪些事

隨時隨地寫日記

• 跨平台應用程式，可在 iPhone、Apple Watch、iPad 和 Mac 上使用
• 可透過電子郵件直接傳送條目到日記中

專為記錄回憶打造

• 「在這一天」功能讓你重溫過往回憶
• 標籤、我的最愛和搜尋篩選條件讓你輕鬆找到所需內容
• 「地圖檢視」讓你快速查看已記錄的所有地點

*Day One 是款提供使用者永久免費使用的應用程式，完全不限條目數量。 Day One Premium 會員另可享有無限量照片、影片及同步功能。 立即開始免費試用。

隱私權政策：https://dayoneapp.com/privacy-policy/

使用條款：https://dayoneapp.com/terms-of-use/

如需技術協助或有其他問題，請前往：https://dayoneapp.com/contact/

tw.description:
Thumper是一款節奏暴力遊戲：經典動作、猛烈的速度和野蠻的肉體衝撞。你是一隻太空甲蟲，勇敢闖入虛無空間，對抗巨大的首腦。

藉由特別的便攜版，讓你一手掌握九個史詩級別。

向前邁進，掌握新動作，並在可怕的魔王戰中倖存下來。被衝擊原聲推動，你會感受到每一個破碎的影響。要達到共鳴，你必須征服節奏地獄。

■特點■
·氣密一觸式控制
·肖像和風景皆為流暢的60 FPS
·九個史詩級別
·刺激的魔王戰
·迷幻視覺效果和原創配樂
·PLAY+模式（增加挑戰難度和速度）
·在iPhone X上以全螢幕顯示
·iCloud 同步

■請注意■
無線耳機會造成顯著的音頻延遲。為了獲得最佳體驗，強烈建議使用有線耳機或音響。

advisories: 偶而/輕微的酒精、菸草或藥物使用或相關內容

tw.description:
你獨自一人在一座陌生的島嶼醒來，島上充滿各種令人意想不到的謎題，等你來挑戰。

你不記得自己是誰，也不記得是如何來到這裡，你唯一能做的就是探索這座島嶼，希望挖掘線索找回自己的記憶，想辦法找到回家的路。

The Witness 是一個單人遊戲，玩家在一個含有數十個地點的開放世界裡探索並克服 500 道以上的謎題。這個遊戲相當敬重玩家的聰明才智，並珍惜他們寶貴的時間。這裡沒有濫竽充數的謎題，每道謎題都結合新的概念在裡面。所以，這是一個充滿創意的遊戲。

Incredibox 能讓你在一群快樂的節奏口技達人幫助下創作自己的音樂。選擇你的音樂風格，開始錄製、錄音並分享你的混音曲。透過嘻哈節拍、電子波、流行人聲、爵士搖擺、巴西節奏等等聲音，讓你沉醉在音樂的律動之中。此外，還可以探索社群創建的各種模組，其內容素材豐富，能讓你混音上數小時，而且無廣告或應用程式內購。

Incredibox 是遊戲，也是工具，更重要的是一種視聽體驗，所帶來的樂趣很快就成為各年齡層的熱門選擇。音樂、圖形、動畫與互動性的完美結合，讓 Incredibox 適合每個人。由於 Incredibox 讓學習變得有趣且具娛樂性，現在廣為全球各地學校使用。

怎麼玩？很簡單！將圖示拖放到虛擬人物上讓他們唱歌，然後開始創作你的音樂。找對的聲音組合，解鎖動畫合唱，增強你的旋律。

只要你的作品聽起來很棒，就儲存並分享，以盡可能獲得投票。假如你獲得足夠的票數，就能進入 Incredibox 歷史，加入 50 強排行榜！準備好展示你的作品了嗎？

你還可以從應用程式中將你的混音曲下載成 MP3 反覆聆聽！

懶得創作自己的混音曲？沒問題，讓自動模式為你播放吧！

調高音量，輕鬆一下 ;)

****************
Incredibox，來自法國里昂，於 2009 年創立的 So Far So Good 工作室的心血結晶。最初以網頁形式出現，隨後推出了移動及平板應用程式，迅速成為熱門產品。它贏得了多項獎項，並出現在各大國際媒體上，包括：BBC、Adobe、FWA、Gizmodo、Slate、Konbini、Softonic、Kotaku、Cosmopolitan、PocketGamer、AppAdvice、AppSpy、Vice、Ultralinx 等等。線上演示影片自創建以來已吸引超過 1 億訪問者。

MiniGames 是一個包含新、復古和現代遊戲的合集。您可以在您的 Apple Watch、iPhone 或 iPad 上無廣告遊玩！
這就像是您隨身攜帶的個人遊戲機台。

這個合集包含 24 款遊戲：

■ PONG
遊玩其中一個最早創建的電子遊戲。這個簡單的網球類遊戲是一個絕對的經典。

■ BRICK BREAK
一個有趣的復古落磚遊戲。使用數位旋鈕或您的手指來移動磚塊。點擊以旋轉，向下滑動以放置磚塊。將磚塊堆疊在一起以清除一行並獲取一些分數。

■ INVADERS
經典街機動作。射擊所有太空入侵者，在他們抓到你之前。擊中母艦以獲取獎勵分數。

■ 2048
在您的手錶或手機上享受令人上癮的 2048 遊戲。滑動數字瓷磚來合併它們。將瓷磚合併以達到 2048。

■ TUBE TWIST
引導您的跑者穿過無盡的管道。扭轉管道以避開洞穴和尖刺。收集黃色能量球，收集的越多，速度提升的時間越長。點擊您的玩家來啟動加速。加速時撞擊紅色跳躍點可獲取額外分數。

■ BUBBLE
經典的三消益智遊戲。按顏色連接泡泡以清除它們。

■ MISSILE
您能在致命的追蹤導彈攻擊下生存多久？操縱您的戰鬥機以避開導彈並讓它們互相碰撞。

■ HOP
從平台跳到平台以獲得更多的高度和分數。在途中射擊帶翅膀的壞蛋。

■ DRIFT
享受在險惡道路上的高辛烷值漂移。一個錯誤的動作就會墜落。儘可能長時間生存以獲得最高分數。收集星星以獲取額外分數。

■ CONG
這像 Pong，但在一個圓圈裡。使用數位旋鈕來移動圓圈內的拍子，保持球在遊戲中。

■ TOWER
通過堆疊彩色方塊來建造您的塔。完美放置它們以獲取額外分數。

■ FLAP
引導鳥兒穿越無盡的森林，不斷拍動翅膀。

■ FROG ROAD
幫助可愛的青蛙避開汽車並穿過馬路。這是經典 Frogger 遊戲的 3D 升級版。

■ BLOCK RUN
想跑步嗎？幫助體素小人避開五彩繽紛的障礙物，通過跳躍、滾動和轉彎來完成挑戰。

■ MATCHTRIS
Tetris 和 Dr. Mario 的混搭遊戲。移動下落的方塊來連接 4 個或更多相同顏色的方塊以清除它們。設置方塊以實現連鎖反應並獲取額外分數。

■ DRONE
駕駛您的無人機穿過外星飛船的無盡走廊。

■ THRUST
穿上火箭靴並飛越黑暗的洞穴。Thrust 結合了經典洞穴飛行遊戲和 Flappy Bird 的元素。

■ SUPER JUMP
我們將平台遊戲的樂趣與無盡奔跑者遊戲相結合。通過跳過洞穴、壕溝和敵人來保持您的玩家奔跑。收集水果以獲取分數，您得分越多，跑得越快。

■ RETRO RACER
受 Outrun 和 Pole Position 等偽 3D 賽車遊戲啟發，但具有現代圖形。享受超現實、令人興奮的速度感，並競速以擊敗時鐘。

請注意，此遊戲需要第 4 代或更新版本的 Apple Watch。

■ CONTRA PANG
將 Contra 的射擊動作與 Pang 的泡泡消除樂趣相結合的遊戲。

■ CIRCLE INVADERS
經典 Space Invaders 的新變種。具有獨特的圓形設計和大量的能量提升。

■ MOON SNAKE
我們將經典的吃水果蛇遊戲帶到了月球。避開炸彈和自己的尾巴以生存。

■ DUAL BREAK
還有什麼比經典的 Breakout 拍子遊戲更好？怎麼樣再加上能量提升和額外的拍子來控制。

■ CIRCLE BREAK
這就像圓形 Pong 遇上 Breakout。保持球不離開圓圈並打破所有障礙以完成關卡。

功能：
• 無廣告！
• 支援 Apple Watch
• 屏幕震動
• 震動效果
• 音效
• 音樂
• 排行榜

Speech to text : Voice to text  is the powerful, real-time dictation solution. Based on the latest artificial intelligence and using a powerful speech recognition engine, This Dictation app accurately transcribes your speech to text in real time. 

The clean elegant design, along with the non-stop voice recognition and other features means you can relax and focus on your thoughts and content.

Using our app , your words will be magically transcribed into text without your ever needing to touch a keyboard. Now you can use the power of your voice to create your words!

Easily share your text and files later! (Works with Evernote, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, WhatsApp and other iOS supported sharing apps.)


Whether you’re a professional writer, doctor, lawyer, disabled or somehow prevented from traditional typing, Speech to text : Voice to text app will swiftly solve your transcription problems and help you achieve your writing goals today!



This fantastic speech-to-text app will allow you to do more with your iPhone/ iPad :

・Longer Record time:
 -DICTATE CONTINUOUSLY up-to 1 HOUR.

・Unlimited save & edits

・Transcribed text can be edited directly.
・Ideal for both individual and group transcription
・Background support for voice recognition.

• Voice recognition support for 59 languages and accents.
• Share your text on social networks.
• Copy your text to other apps.
• Send your text as an email or text message.

• Create PDF instantly with single click.

Technology:

Faster ,Automatically adapts to the user

Super easy: Simply click the microphone and start dictating. No need to login or register

You can add new paragraphs, punctuation marks, smileys and other special characters using simple voice commands.

Who Should Use Speech to Text : Voice to Text ?

1. Reporters: Interviews, conversations and more are easily recorded and transcribed, preserving the original audio.

Device and System Tools

Network Tools

Utility Tools

Highlights

• Lightweight and battery-efficient
• Compatible with all iOS devices

Perfect for

Download MagicKit AI today and simplify your daily tasks with one smart, powerful toolkit.

us.description:
Atomic Space Age was a blast! Until it became the Post-Apocalyptic Space Age.

Your space station is about to explode and you only have 60 seconds before things get messy. What (or who) will you grab before you make a mad dash for the emergency shuttle and begin your journey into THE GREAT UNKNOWN?

This is 60 Parsecs!, a dark comedy sci-fi adventure set in the Atomic Space Age - complete with all the Cold War paranoia, chrome-plated wall accents and cockroaches with space helmets.

Lead a crew of woefully unprepared astronauts, equipped with whatever junk - sorry - "supplies" you can grab before blasting off, on a journey across the cosmos that's best described as misguided. Make the best of it, while dealing with soup shortages and other horrors of outer space. Will you have what it takes to find a new home and survive?

Bon voyage!


SCAVENGE & EVACUATE
With only 60 seconds before nukes reduce the space station to floating particles in the vacuum of space, frantically grab whatever supplies and crew you can before getting out of there. You never know when that sock puppet will come in handy.

SURVIVE & DECIDE
Space funerals are inconvenient, so try to avoid dying where possible. Use your limited supplies and (hopefully not limited) wits to make difficult choices and ensure your survival, even though the odds are definitely stacked against you.

EXPLORE & CRAFT
Duct tape fixes all problems, but how do you fix (or at least craft) duct tape? Chart expeditions to find resources, craft survival essentials and explore strange new worlds in a procedural, very-much-permadeath adventure.

LEAD & PROTECT
As captain, it's your duty to keep the crew happy - they're less likely to kill you that way. Manage relationships as you watch them grow closer and hopefully not throw each other out the airlock.

us.description:
Dolores, Ted, Mary Jane and Timmy return to face the nuclear apocalypse in this new, remastered edition of the classic atomic adventure - 60 Seconds! Reatomized, featuring high resolution art support, refreshed 2D graphics and hand-drawn 3D textures, new interactive menu, improved UI system, a technical refresh, and of course... new content!

NEW GAMEPLAY MODE
Survival Challenges - unique, short storylines which will put your survival skills to the test!

NEW OPPORTUNITIES
to escape the wasteland in form of a storyline spanning across multiple playthroughs! Can you escape the wasteland in style?

NEW RELATIONSHIP SYSTEM
more stories and crazy interactions between the McDoodle family members!

NEW SOUNDS, ART AND UNLOCKABLE VISUAL CONTENT
allowing you to add a little color to your fallout shelter!

NEW ACHIEVEMENTS!

With only 60 seconds left to impact, go on a mad dash through the house in search of family members and useful supplies. Everything will be against you: time, your very own furniture, a house that's different every time you play, and the fundamental question... what to take with you and who to leave behind?

Reaching the fallout shelter in time, alive, is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland.

Good luck.

Moncage is a stunning vignette puzzle adventure developed by Optillusion. 

The game takes place inside a mysterious cube, with each side of the cube housing a unique world: be it an old factory, a light tower, an amusement park, or a church, etc. At first sight, they may seem random and unrelated, but upon closer look, you will become mesmerized by the subtle and intricate ways of how these worlds connect…  

【Solve Puzzles with Mind-Boggling Optical Illusions】
Use your imagination and spare no brain cells to find the connection and pinpoint every possible interaction between different sides of the cube, then watch as the magic unfold in front of you.

【Collect All Photos to Unveil the Story】
Behind the puzzles, there lies a story with a surprising twist for the player to uncover. Collect the photos from obscure corners and angles to reveal the underlying story, one photo at a time.

【Get Unstuck with Thoughtful Hints】
There is a multitude of guidance systems to help prevent players from getting stuck. Focus can be activated to highlight the key items to the solution, while hint texts are available to provide further clarity. And, if all else fails, video walkthroughs can be unlocked as the ultimate safety plan. 

【Prove Your Puzzle-Solving Skills with Medals】
There are a total of 15 achievements in the game, each corresponding with a Medal that has been crafted with a uniquely stunning design. A complete collection of the 15 Medals could be the perfect evidence to attest to your master puzzle-solving skills~

us.description:
You are reading this text.
 But why?
 Are you looking for a game,
 or has the game found you?
 Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game.
 It is a simulation of creating a new reality.
 Will you shape faith,
 or will faith shape you?
 Humanity has always sought light in the darkness.
 It has always longed to believe in something greater,
 something that gives meaning to existence.
 That’s how religions were born –
 as beacons in the storms of history,
 as compasses in the ocean of life.
 What if you become the creator of a religion?
 What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality?
You are the Creator.
 You are the source.
 You are the inspiration.
 And if you are reading this text – you’re already in the game!
 All that’s left is to install – and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions!

 Become the source of faith – in the strategy simulator Religion Inc.

 Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness.

 There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity.

Game Features
*A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions!
*Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more!
*Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours!
*Hundreds of real-world religious aspects – and even more to come! Learn more about world religions!
*Unique active abilities for each archetype – perform miracles and change the world!
*Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy!

Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator – Religion Inc.

Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!

us.description:
You wake up, alone, on a strange island full of puzzles that will challenge and surprise you.

You don't remember who you are, and you don't remember how you got here, but there's one thing you can do: explore the island in hope of discovering clues, regaining your memory, and somehow finding your way home.

The Witness is a single-player game in an open world with dozens of locations to explore and over 500 puzzles. This game respects you as an intelligent player and it treats your time as precious. There's no filler; each of those puzzles brings its own new idea into the mix. So, this is a game full of ideas.

The best interactive app for learning musculoskeletal anatomy. 

AnatomyMapp® combines an empowering collection of study tools for the popular Trail Guide to the Body—a best-selling musculoskeletal anatomy textbook—into a single interactive app! It's great for not only reinforcing your textbook learning but also for studying while on the bus, having a snack, or pretty much wherever you have your phone.
 
AnatomyMapp® includes information from all 362 Trail Guide to the Body Flashcards; questions from the Trail Guide to the Body Student Workbook; and easy search and bookmarking capabilities:

• Test your musculoskeletal anatomy knowledge by (1) answering multiple choice question (muscle cards only); (2) locating specific structures; or (3) identifying actions, origins, insertions, and nerve innervations (AOIN).

• Bookmark specific cards to review later and use enhanced navigation features for bookmarked cards.

• Apply the easy search function to choose all cards or only cards you’ve bookmarked.

• Find additional information in the Trail Guide to the Body textbook with page references on each card.

• Zoom into cards to enhance your view of the illustrations.

• Learn correct pronunciation using the app’s audio pronunciation.
 
Designed to be viewed in portrait mode. 
 
If you have any comments or suggestions, we’d like to hear from you at info@booksofdiscovery.com.
 
More than 2,000 manual therapy programs have chosen Trail Guide to the Body products for their students. The textbook is sold in nearly 40 countries.
 
AnatomyMapp® is a registered trademark of Books of Discovery. Learn more at booksofdiscovery.com.

Incredibox lets you create your own music with the help of a merry crew of beatboxers. Choose your musical style to start laying down, recording and sharing your mix. Get your groove on with hip-hop beats, electro waves, pop voices, jazzy swing, Brazilian rhythms and much more. As well, discover a selection of mods created by the community. Plenty to keep you mixing for hours, with no ads or microtransactions.

Part game, part tool, Incredibox is above all an audio and visual experience that has quickly become a hit with people of all ages. The right mix of music, graphics, animation and interactivity makes Incredibox ideal for everyone. And because it makes learning fun and entertaining, Incredibox is now being used by schools all over the world.

How to play? Easy! Drag and drop icons onto the avatars to make them sing and start to compose your own music. Find the right sound combos to unlock animated choruses that will enhance your tune.

Once your composition sounds great, just save it and share it to get as many votes as possible. If you get enough votes, you may go down in Incredibox history by joining the Top 50 chart! Ready to show your stuff?

You can also download your mix as an MP3 from the app and listen to it over and over again!

Too lazy to create your own mix? No problem, just let the automatic mode play for you!

Pump it up and chill ;)

****************
Incredibox, the brainchild of Lyon, France-based studio So Far So Good, was created in 2009. Starting out as a webpage, it was then released as a mobile and tablet app and became an instant hit. It has won several awards and appeared in various international media, including: BBC, Adobe, FWA, Gizmodo, Slate, Konbini, Softonic, Kotaku, Cosmopolitan, PocketGamer, AppAdvice, AppSpy, Vice, Ultralinx and many others. The online demo has attracted more than 100 million visitors since its creation.

MiniGames is a collection of new, retro and modern games. You can play on your Apple Watch, iPhone or iPad with no Ads!
It's like your own personal games arcade on the go.

This collection of 24 games includes:

■ PONG
Play one of the first video games ever created. This simple tennis like game is an absolute classic. 

■ BRICK BREAK
A fun retro falling brick game. Use the Digital crown or your finger to move the bricks around. Tap to rotate and swipe down to place the brick. Stack the bricks together to clear a line and score some points.

■ INVADERS
Classic arcade action. Shoot all the space invaders before they get you. Hit the mothership for bonus points.

■ 2048
Enjoy the addictive 2048 game on your watch or phone. Swipe the number tiles around to join them. Join the tiles to reach 2048.

■ TUBE TWIST
Guide your runner down an endless tube. Twist the tube to avoid the holes and spikes. Collect the yellow power orbs, the more you collect the longer you can speed boost. Tap your player to activate your speed boost. Hit the red jumps while boosting to get your bonus score. 

■ BUBBLE
Classic match 3 puzzle game. Connect the bubbles by color to clear them.

■ MISSILE
How long can you survive a deadly onslaught of homing missiles? Maneuver your fighter plane to avoid the missiles and make them crash into each other. 

■ HOP
Jump from platform to platform to gain more height and points. Shoot the winged baddies along the way.

■ Drift
Enjoy high octane drifting down a treacherous road. One false move and down you go. Try and survive as long as you can to get the top score. Collect the stars for bonus points.

■ Cong
It's like pong, but in a circle. Use the digital crown to move the paddle around the circle and keep the ball in play.

■ Tower
Build your Tower by stacking colourful blocks on top of each other. Place them perfectly for bonus points.

■ FLAP
Guide the bird through a never ending forest by flapping your wings.

■ FROG ROAD
Help the cute frogs avoid the cars and cross the road. A 3D update to the classic Frogger game.

■ BLOCK RUN
Feel like going for a a run? Help the voxel guy avoid the colourful obstacles by jumping, rolling and turning around the corners.

■ MATCHTRIS
A mashup of Tetris and Dr. Mario. Move the falling blocks to match 4 or more colors to clear them. Setup the blocks to fall and match for combos and extra points.

■ DRONE
Pilot your drone down the never ending corridors of an Alien spaceship.

■ THRUST
Strap your rocket boots on and zoom down a dark cave. Thrust combines a classic cave flyer game with elements of flappy bird.

■ SUPER JUMP
We’ve taken the fun of the humble platformer game and mashed it with an endless runner. Keep your player running by jumping over holes, ditches and enemies. Collect fruit to score points and the more you score the faster you run. 

■ RETRO RACER
Inspired by pseudo 3d racing games like Outrun and Pole Position but with modern graphics. Enjoy the surreal, exhilarating sense of speed while you race to beat the clock.

Please note this game requires a watch series 4 or newer.

■ CONTRA PANG
A mashup of Contra’s shooting action and the bubble popping fun of Pang.

■ CIRCLE INVADERS
A new twist to the classic Space Invaders. With a unique circular design and lots of power-ups.

■ MOON SNAKE
We took the classic fruit eating snake and put him on the moon. Avoid the bombs and your own tail to survive. 

■ DUAL BREAK
What could be better than the classic paddle game Breakout? How about power-ups and an extra paddle to control.

■ CIRCLE BREAK
It’s like Pong in a Circle meets Breakout. Keep the ball from leaving the circle and break all the obstacles to finish the stage.

Easily share your text and files later! (Works with Evernote, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, WhatsApp and other iOS supported sharing apps.)


Whether you’re a professional writer, doctor, lawyer, disabled or somehow prevented from traditional typing, Speech to text : Voice to text app will swiftly solve your transcription problems and help you achieve your writing goals today!

Technology:
New iOS 14 Speech framework having state of the art accuracy,
Faster ,Automatically adapts to the user

Super easy: Simply click the microphone and start dictating. No need to login or register

You can add new paragraphs, punctuation marks, smileys and other special characters using simple voice commands.

Who Should Use Speech to Text : Voice to Text ?

MagicKit AI – All-in-One Device and Utility Toolkit

MagicKit AI is a complete utility app designed to help you monitor your device, optimize performance, and access everyday tools from one convenient interface. Built specifically for iOS, MagicKit AI brings together essential features while maintaining your privacy and battery life.

Device and System Tools

• Uptime Tracker: Monitor how long your device has been running
• Battery Tips: Get practical advice to improve battery usage
• Photo Cleaner: Detect and remove duplicate or similar photos to free up space
• Contact Cleaner: Organize contacts by finding duplicates and incomplete entries
• RAM Manager: Monitor memory usage and optimize performance
• Device Benchmark: Test CPU, GPU, memory, and network performance

Network Tools
• Speed Test: Measure internet connection speed
• Wi-Fi Info: See network name, IP address, and connection status
• IP Lookup: Check geolocation of public IP addresses
• Location Info: Track GPS location, speed, direction, and altitude

Security & Privacy Tools
• Password Generator: Create strong, secure passwords with customizable options
• Passphrase Generator: Generate memorable and secure passphrases
• UUID Generator: Create unique identifiers in various formats
• Secure PIN Generator: Generate secure PIN codes with multiple options
• Temporary Email: Create disposable email addresses for privacy protection

Utility Tools
• Unit Converter: Convert between different measurements
• Currency & Crypto Converter: Get live exchange rates for fiat and cryptocurrencies
• Date Time Calculator: Calculate differences between dates with business days support
• Time Zone Converter: Convert time across various time zones with live updates and DST status
• Countdown & Reminders: Create beautiful countdowns with customizable reminders and recurring events
• Magic Counter: Track multiple counters with detailed statistics and streaks
• QR Scanner: Scan QR codes instantly
• Document & Card Scanner: Capture and save high-quality document scans with AI-powered text recognition
• Compass and Level: Measure direction and level using device sensors
• Orientation Lock: Lock screen orientation while using the app
• Audio Meter: Measure surrounding sound levels using the microphone
• Clipboard Manager: Access and manage copied text within the app session
• Flashlight & Brightness: Turn on the device flashlight and adjust screen brightness
• Note Taker: Create, organize, and manage notes with categories and iCloud backup
• Universal Generator: Generate random data including text, numbers, dates, and more

Highlights
• Clean and user-friendly interface with new wizard-based tools
• Featured Tools section showcasing the most popular utilities
• No ads or in-app purchases
• Lightweight and battery-efficient
• Compatible with all iOS devices
• Frequent updates with new tools
• Built with privacy and performance in mind
• Dark/Light theme support with smooth animations

Perfect for
• Device monitoring and optimization
• Everyday measurement and conversion tasks
• Scanning documents and QR codes
• Cleaning up photo storage and contacts
• Creating and managing countdowns with reminders
• Tracking habits and progress with multiple counters
• Accessing quick tools like flashlight and brightness control
• Performing simple network diagnostics
• Generating secure passwords and managing privacy
• Taking quick notes and organizing information

Download MagicKit AI today and simplify your daily tasks with one smart, powerful toolkit.

tr.description:
Atomic Space Age was a blast! Until it became the Post-Apocalyptic Space Age.

Your space station is about to explode and you only have 60 seconds before things get messy. What (or who) will you grab before you make a mad dash for the emergency shuttle and begin your journey into THE GREAT UNKNOWN?

This is 60 Parsecs!, a dark comedy sci-fi adventure set in the Atomic Space Age - complete with all the Cold War paranoia, chrome-plated wall accents and cockroaches with space helmets.

Lead a crew of woefully unprepared astronauts, equipped with whatever junk - sorry - "supplies" you can grab before blasting off, on a journey across the cosmos that's best described as misguided. Make the best of it, while dealing with soup shortages and other horrors of outer space. Will you have what it takes to find a new home and survive?

Bon voyage!


SCAVENGE & EVACUATE
With only 60 seconds before nukes reduce the space station to floating particles in the vacuum of space, frantically grab whatever supplies and crew you can before getting out of there. You never know when that sock puppet will come in handy.

SURVIVE & DECIDE
Space funerals are inconvenient, so try to avoid dying where possible. Use your limited supplies and (hopefully not limited) wits to make difficult choices and ensure your survival, even though the odds are definitely stacked against you.

EXPLORE & CRAFT
Duct tape fixes all problems, but how do you fix (or at least craft) duct tape? Chart expeditions to find resources, craft survival essentials and explore strange new worlds in a procedural, very-much-permadeath adventure.

LEAD & PROTECT
As captain, it's your duty to keep the crew happy - they're less likely to kill you that way. Manage relationships as you watch them grow closer and hopefully not throw each other out the airlock.

tr.description:
1984 kitabından esinlenen distopik bir hayatta kalma deneyimi.

Aylık Distopya'da diktatörlük ile yönetilen bir dünyada hayatta kalmaya çalışacaksın. İyi bir yurttaş olarak diktatörlüğe hizmet edebilir ya da direniş ile işbirliği yaparak ülkeden kaçmaya çalışabilirsin. Aşkın yasak olduğu, partinin istemediği sözcüklerin cezasının idam olduğu bir yönetim altında yaşıyorsun. Fikir suçlusu olmamak için konuştuğun kelimeleri iyi seçmelisin. Unutma seni her an izleyen bir ekran var. Bakanlıktaki işinde geçmişi değiştirerek kazandığın para hayatta kalacak erzağı almana zar zor yeterken, düşünmenin bile yasak olduğu bu dünyadan kaçmanın bir yolunu bulmalısın.

Sadık bir yurttaş gibi hizmet edebilir, yakalanma korkusu ile aşık olabilir, direniş ile diktatörlüğe karşı çalışabilir, özgürlük ya da tutsaklık için seçimler yapabilirsin. 

Dairende yaptığın günlük işlerin hayatta kalmanın tek yolu olduğunu bilmelisin, erzağının yanında zaman da kısıtlı bir kaynak. Bakanlıkta ki işine gitmeden önce yemek yapmak, hastalığın için ilaç içmek ya da psikolojine iyi gelecek şeyler yapmak arasında tercihler yapman gerekecek. 

Vicdan ile kararlar vererek tanıdığın insanları korumayı dene ya da yaşadığın distopyadan kurtulmak için onları arkanda bırak.

tr.description:
RULE YOUR TOWN, BUILD YOUR CITY, BALANCE YOUR RESOURCES!
Swipe each card with one finger, become mayor, make bold decisions, please your people and carve your own reign into history!

Mayor Card fuses classic city-management simulation with lightning-fast swipe-card action to create a fresh strategy deck-builder. Drag every card left or right; collect taxes, protect nature, grow population and keep every resource bar alive. Let any gauge hit zero and you’re out of office—maintain the balance, win, and unlock new cards to build an even greater city.

KEY FEATURES

• 740 Unique Cards - 740 unique choices—every decision is yours!
• Swipe & Decide – Instant control, deep consequence.
• Triple Balance System – People, economy & nature; set tax rates, raise funds, stay green.
• Chain Cards – Risk-reward event chains; one move shapes the future.
• Adventure Cards – Call-Progress-Outcome stories; every deck hides new town legends.
• Character Stories – Treasure Hunter, Chef, Thief… each NPC steers you to a different ending.
• Endless Replayability – Random decks, alternate finales: every management term feels new.


LAUNCH DISCOUNT — NOW LIVE!
Limited-time offer for early mayors: swipe cards, grow your city, expand your town and rise as a legendary city leader. Download, govern and win today!

Incredibox, the brainchild of Lyon, France-based studio So Far So Good, was created in 2009. Starting out as a webpage, it was then released as a mobile and tablet app and became an instant hit. It has won several awards and appeared in various international media, including: BBC, Adobe, FWA, Gizmodo, Slate, Konbini, Softonic, Kotaku, Cosmopolitan, PocketGamer, AppAdvice, AppSpy, Vice, Ultralinx and many others. The online demo has attracted more than 100 million visitors since its creation.

MiniGames is a collection of new, retro and modern games. You can play on your Apple Watch, iPhone or iPad with no Ads!
It's like your own personal games arcade on the go.

This collection of 24 games includes:

■ PONG
Play one of the first video games ever created. This simple tennis like game is an absolute classic. 

■ BRICK BREAK
A fun retro falling brick game. Use the Digital crown or your finger to move the bricks around. Tap to rotate and swipe down to place the brick. Stack the bricks together to clear a line and score some points.

■ INVADERS
Classic arcade action. Shoot all the space invaders before they get you. Hit the mothership for bonus points.

■ 2048
Enjoy the addictive 2048 game on your watch or phone. Swipe the number tiles around to join them. Join the tiles to reach 2048.

■ TUBE TWIST
Guide your runner down an endless tube. Twist the tube to avoid the holes and spikes. Collect the yellow power orbs, the more you collect the longer you can speed boost. Tap your player to activate your speed boost. Hit the red jumps while boosting to get your bonus score. 

■ BUBBLE
Classic match 3 puzzle game. Connect the bubbles by color to clear them.

■ MISSILE
How long can you survive a deadly onslaught of homing missiles? Maneuver your fighter plane to avoid the missiles and make them crash into each other. 

■ HOP
Jump from platform to platform to gain more height and points. Shoot the winged baddies along the way.

■ Drift
Enjoy high octane drifting down a treacherous road. One false move and down you go. Try and survive as long as you can to get the top score. Collect the stars for bonus points.

■ Cong
It's like pong, but in a circle. Use the digital crown to move the paddle around the circle and keep the ball in play.

■ Tower
Build your Tower by stacking colourful blocks on top of each other. Place them perfectly for bonus points.

■ FLAP
Guide the bird through a never ending forest by flapping your wings.

■ FROG ROAD
Help the cute frogs avoid the cars and cross the road. A 3D update to the classic Frogger game.

■ BLOCK RUN
Feel like going for a a run? Help the voxel guy avoid the colourful obstacles by jumping, rolling and turning around the corners.

■ MATCHTRIS
A mashup of Tetris and Dr. Mario. Move the falling blocks to match 4 or more colors to clear them. Setup the blocks to fall and match for combos and extra points.

■ DRONE
Pilot your drone down the never ending corridors of an Alien spaceship.

■ THRUST
Strap your rocket boots on and zoom down a dark cave. Thrust combines a classic cave flyer game with elements of flappy bird.

■ SUPER JUMP
We’ve taken the fun of the humble platformer game and mashed it with an endless runner. Keep your player running by jumping over holes, ditches and enemies. Collect fruit to score points and the more you score the faster you run. 

■ RETRO RACER
Inspired by pseudo 3d racing games like Outrun and Pole Position but with modern graphics. Enjoy the surreal, exhilarating sense of speed while you race to beat the clock.

Please note this game requires a watch series 4 or newer.

■ CONTRA PANG
A mashup of Contra’s shooting action and the bubble popping fun of Pang.

■ CIRCLE INVADERS
A new twist to the classic Space Invaders. With a unique circular design and lots of power-ups.

■ MOON SNAKE
We took the classic fruit eating snake and put him on the moon. Avoid the bombs and your own tail to survive. 

■ DUAL BREAK
What could be better than the classic paddle game Breakout? How about power-ups and an extra paddle to control.

■ CIRCLE BREAK
It’s like Pong in a Circle meets Breakout. Keep the ball from leaving the circle and break all the obstacles to finish the stage.

Features:
• No ads!
• Apple Watch support
• Screen shake
• Vibrations
• Sound Effects 
• Music
• Leaderboards

tr.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

【生辰 App 会员服务说明】

1.会员包含几种订购类型
订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月
2.首次订购后会通过iTunes账户直接支付；账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后自动顺延一个订阅周期
3.本服务由您自主选择是否续订，如需取消，请在订阅到期24小时前，在 AppleID 设置中取消
4.生辰App 会员协议
生辰App 会员服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/
5.生辰App 软件协议与隐私政策
生辰 软件许可及服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-agreement/
生辰 隐私协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/

tr.description:
Tüm dünyayı kendine inandırabilir misin?

Yeni bir inanç ortaya çıktı ve bunu yaymak için sen seçildin. 
İnsanlığın senden ve sözlerinden nefret etmek için hep bir sebebi olacak, yapman gereken sözlerin, mucizelerin kullanmak ve inancın üzerinde yaptığın geliştirmelerin ile dinini tüm dünyaya inandırmak. Nefretlerini kazanmadan insanlar ile konuşmalı, şehirleri gezmeli ve mucizelerin ile yanlışları düzeltmelisin.

Mısır, Kudüs ya da Roma'dan başlayacağın seyahatinde yüzlerce hikaye ve kişi ile karşılaşacak, inancını tüm dünyaya yaymaya çalışırken yirmi farklı sondan birine ulaşacaksın.

Serüvenin boyunca daha fazla inanana ulaşmak için dinini, mucizeler ve felaketler yapabilmek için kendini geliştirebilirsin. 

Sözlerinin etkileri dünyada kaos yaratırken, sen insanların nefreti, yalanlar, krallar ve iblisler ile uğraşarak tüm insanlığın inandığı bir din yaratmalısın.

Yasal Bilgilendirme;
Bu oyun içerisinde, gerçekte var olan herhangi bir inanç ile ilgili hiç bir olay, kişi, hikaye ve kelime kullanılmamıştır. Oyun içerisinde anlatılan hikaye eski bir dönemde geçtiği için tarihi devlet sınırları üzerinden hayali bir harita oluşturulmuştur. Bu oyun içerisinde yer alan karakterler, olaylar, hikayeler ve kelimelerin tamamı hayal ürünüdür ve gerçeği yansıtmamaktadır.

tr.description:
Overwinter Survival is a card-based survival game in which you are stranded on the glaciers of Greenland.

The cold and loneliness ensnare you after your plane breaks down for an unknown reason, leaving you crashed on Greenland's glaciers and seeking shelter at a nearby cabin. Now you must hunt, craft tools and items, and keep your stove fueled to survive in the cold.

In Overwinter Survival, you must use the cards you're dealt to stay alive. You can only use one card per round. With Lady Luck at the helm, no two journeys will be the same.

Fish in the glaciers, hunt with your spear and craft an axe at your workshop to become a lumberjack. To get out of this frozen hell and see your family once again, you must stay alive and repair your plane. 

Experience a unique journey each time you play with randomly generated card decks and test your survival skills while pushing your luck amidst the frozen glaciers.
